name: myAC Slots - All New, Atlantic City Casino Games with Grand Las Vegas Jackpots!
name_original: myAC Slots - All New, Atlantic City Casino Games with Grand Las Vegas Jackpots!
description:
Install myAC Slots Today and start spinning today!

Discover all that Atlantic City has to offer, and Win like a High-Roller! Play with beautiful HD graphics and awesome animations just like in a real Vegas casino.

Get ready to join the hottest party in AC. Just tap to spin!

Awesome features include:
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!
- FREE daily credits!
- 3 deluxe mini-games to max your payouts!
- No internet connection required to play!
- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!
